tool_description:
## Omniinfer API: Fast Image Generation for 10,000+ Models  - Get Started For Free!

💡 **Features:** Text-to-Image / Image-to-Image / ControlNet / LoRA / Inpainting, supporting over 10,000+ models (including Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x, SDXL 1.0, following civitai models, sfw / nsfw, 18+ / no 18+, hentai / no hentai, dreamlike, 3D, realistic, anime, realism, comic, fantasy, quality porn, art ).

🚀 To obtain a higher call limit and unlock additional features, please visit the site: [https://omnii...
title: Omniinfer

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Progress
api_list.description:
This page will help you get started with text to image. Support ControlNet. 
Note if you get "status":0 in the response, please try this endpoint later untill the status become to 2

utterances.utterance: Can you check the progress of the image generation task with ID 12345?
What's the current status of my image creation task with task ID 67890?
Please provide an update on the task with ID 54321.
I need to know the progress of the task with ID 98765.
Could you tell me how far along the task with ID 11223 is?
Check the status of the image generation task with ID 33445.
Is the task with ID 55667 completed yet?
Let me know the current status of the task with ID 77889.
What is the progress of the task with ID 99001?
Can you update me on the status of the task with ID 22334?

api_list.name: Text to Image
api_list.description:
For asynchronous image generation, only a task_id will be returned. You should use the task_id to make a call to the /v2/progress API endpoint in order to retrieve the image generation results.

The output is provided in the format of "image/png".

The request cost is influenced by the following parameters: width, height.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com/v2/txt2img"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "omniinfer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
